name: Mirror Maker
description: The reason we made Mirror Maker is to give the players the freedom to create. Make your own version of Mirror and share it with the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
